title: Should I Just Hush And Stay On The Main Line
itunes:title: Should I Just Hush And Stay On The Main Line
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been married for 11 years to a very religious man. When I say my husband loves the Lord, he loves the Lord! He is 5 years older than me and he dedicated his life to Christ 3 years before meeting me. He said it was the Lord that led him to me. Because of him, I got saved and really got into church. I am a faithful Christian, but I can’t quote scriptures like he can..........

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been married for 11 years to a very religious man. When I say my husband loves the Lord, he loves the Lord! He is 5 years older than me and he dedicated his life to Christ 3 years before meeting me. He said it was the Lord that led him to me. Because of him, I got saved and really got into church. I am a faithful Christian, but I can’t quote scriptures like he can..........
